DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate feasibility safety autologous transplantation CD34+Thy-1+ hematopoietic stem cell afer high dose marrow ablative chemotherapy patient breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: CD34 Selection Peripheral Blood Stem Cell Graft Autologous Transplant
DOC.detailed_description: Selection CD34+THY-1 Positive Cells From Peripheral Blood Cells Procured Autologous Hematopoietic Support Following High Dose Treatment BCNU , Cyclophosphamide & Cisplatin Stage IV Breast Cancer & Limited Prior Treatment
DOC.criteria: stage IV breast cancer primary breast cancer express CD34+ adequate organ function evidence active infection chemotherapy within 4 week CNS disease
